about.label: Our Story
about.title: About SP Granites
about.subtitle: Building trust through quality stone craftsmanship since 2000.
about.whoWeAreP1: SP Granites is a leading provider of premium granite, marble, and natural stone products based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. For over 25 years, we have been transforming homes, offices, and commercial spaces with our curated collection of high-quality stone surfaces.
about.whoWeAreP2: What started as a small family-run stone workshop has grown into a trusted name in the stone industry. Today, we serve thousands of customers across South India, offering everything from raw slabs to fully fabricated countertops, flooring, and custom stonework.
about.whoWeAreP3: Our state-of-the-art fabrication facility is equipped with the latest CNC machinery and diamond cutting tools, allowing us to achieve precision cuts and flawless finishes that meet international standards.
about.missionText: To make premium natural stone accessible and affordable for every Indian home, while maintaining the highest standards of quality, craftsmanship, and customer service.
about.visionText: To be South India's most trusted stone partner, known for unmatched quality, innovative design solutions, and a seamless customer experience from selection to installation.
about.premiumQualityDesc: We source only the finest granite, marble, and quartz from trusted quarries worldwide, ensuring every piece meets our exacting standards.
about.expertCraftsmanshipDesc: Our team of skilled artisans combines traditional techniques with modern CNC technology to deliver flawless cuts and finishes.
about.customerFirstDesc: From free consultations to after-installation support, we walk with you through every step of your stone project journey.
about.timelyDeliveryDesc: We understand the importance of your timeline. Our dedicated logistics team ensures on-time delivery to your project site.
about.ctaText: Whether you're renovating your kitchen, building a new home, or designing a commercial space, we're here to help you find the perfect stone.
